item.title: Vienna Home Prices Face Slow Correction Rather Than Sudden Drop
item.description: Vienna Home Prices Face Slow Correction The Austrian National Bank (ANB) expects a slow correction in home prices in Vienna over the next few years. The ANB cites several factors for its forecast, including: Low risk of forced sales: There are few homeowners in Vienna who are at risk of being forced to sell their homes due to financial hardship.
